mapper.select: SELECT * FROM subject WHERE id in (SELECT knowledge.subject_id FROM answer, exercise, knowledge where answer.exercise_id=exercise.id and exercise.knowledge_id=knowledge.id and answer.user_email=#{email})

SELECT SUM(max) as sum FROM (SELECT MAX(answer.is_right) as max FROM answer, exercise, knowledge where answer.exercise_id=exercise.id and exercise.knowledge_id=knowledge.id and answer.user_email=#{user.email} and knowledge.subject_id=#{subject.id} GROUP BY exercise.id HAVING max != -1) as T;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM exercise, knowledge WHERE exercise.knowledge_id=knowledge.id AND knowledge.subject_id=#{subject.id}

SELECT SUM(max) as sum FROM (SELECT MAX(answer.is_right) as max FROM answer, exercise where answer.exercise_id=exercise.id and exercise.knowledge_id=#{knowledge.id} and answer.user_email=#{user.email} GROUP BY exercise.id HAVING max != -1) as T;

SELECT SUM(max) as sum FROM (SELECT MAX(answer.is_right) as max FROM answer, exercise where answer.exercise_id=exercise.id and exercise.homework_id=#{homework.id} and answer.user_email=#{user.email} GROUP BY exercise.id HAVING max != -1) as T;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM exercise WHERE exercise.knowledge_id=#{knowledge.id};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM exercise WHERE exercise.homework_id=#{homework.id};
SELECT dependent_knowledge_id FROM knowledge_dependency where knowledge_id=#{id};
